en: And Mummy Pig has a surprise for everyone.
zh: 猪妈妈准备了一个惊喜给大家。

en: Today is a day for pancakes!
I'm the expert at flipping the pancakes over!
zh: 我是一个抛煎饼的高手！

en: Last time you got a bit grumpy when you dropped the pancake on the floor.
zh: 上次，当你将煎饼掉在地上时你可有点焦躁哦

en: There was a problem with the frying pan.
Mummy. Can we help make the pancakes, please?
zh: 妈妈。我们可以帮忙做煎饼吗？

en: Yes. You can help me make the batter.
zh: 可以。你们可以帮我做面糊。

en: First, I put some flour in the bowl.
zh: 首先，我把面粉放进碗里。

en: And I give it all a stir.

zh: 妈妈，可以让我来搅拌吗？

en: George wants to stir as well.
You two sit at the table while I cook the pancakes.
zh: 我做煎饼时，你俩坐在桌旁。

en: Mummy Pig is going to flip the pancake over!
zh: 妈妈要把煎饼翻过来啦！

en: You could flip it higher,Mummy Pig.
zh: 你可以翻得更高点，猪妈妈。

en: You can show us how, when you flip your own pancake, Daddy Pig.
zh: 猪爸爸，等你做你自己的那个煎饼时，你可以教教我们。

en: This first pancake is for George.
zh: 第一个煎饼是给乔治的。

en: Mummy Pig pours a little syrup on George's pancake.
zh: 猪妈妈倒了些糖浆在乔治的煎饼上。

en: Hmmm... you could flip it higher, Mummy Pig.
zh: 嗯。。。你可以翻得更高点的，猪妈妈。

en: You will get a chance to show me when you flip you own pancake, Daddy Pig.
zh: 猪爸爸，等你翻你自己的煎饼时你就可以给我展示了。

en: This pancake is for Mummy Pig.
zh: 这个煎饼是给猪妈妈的。

en: You still aren't flipping them high enough,Mummy Pig.
zh: 你仍然抛得不够高，猪妈妈。

en: The next pancake is yours, Daddy Pig.
zh: 下一个煎饼是你的，猪爸爸。

en: So now you can show us how it should be done.
zh: 现在你可以给我们展示一下怎么做了。

en: The secret of making a good pancake is to flip it high into the air.
zh: 做出好吃的煎饼的秘密是把它翻到高空中。

en: Oh...maybe that was just a bit too high.
What a shame, that was the last pancake.
zh: 真可惜，这可是最后一个煎饼。

en: It should be a simple matter to get it down.
zh: 应该很容易把它拿下来。

en: Oh, dear. Daddy Pig cannot reach his pancake.
zh: 哦，糟糕。猪爸爸够不着他的煎饼。

en: I think I know a way to get it down.
zh: 我想我知道一个办法让它落下来。

en: What is Mummy Pig planning to do?
On the count of three,We all have to start jumping up and down.
Now Daddy Pig has his pancake.
zh: 现在猪爸爸拿到煎饼了。

en: Daddy has a pancake on his head!
zh: 爸爸的煎饼掉到了他头上！

en: Syrup on your pancake, Daddy Pig?
zh: 你的煎饼要放糖浆吗，猪爸爸？
